metadata.Title: CVE-2013-6466 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Openswan 2.6.39 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and IKE daemon restart) via IKEv2 packets that lack expected payloads.

criterions.comment: openswan: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
